Key Match Events: Ilkay Gündogan created the opener for Jamal Musiala and scored the second goal for Germany.
Manuel Neuer made crucial saves, including a dive at the feet of Roland Sallai and repelling a Dominik Szoboszlai free-kick.
Joshua Kimmich made a late goalline clearance to preserve Germany's lead.
Post-Match Reflections: Ilkay Gündogan praised Jamal Musiala, stating 'The way he’s going right now, he can be one of the best.'

Julian Nagelsmann praised Gündogan's performance, saying 'He worked amazingly. He tried to steer the match, he used some of the stoppages and tried to double check things with me. I have big trust in him because I know what is within him.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hungary's Marco Rossi accused the referee of 'double standard' after the loss to Germany.
Hungary had a goal correctly disallowed before the interval.
Germany's local players, including Maximilian Mittelstädt, Chris Fuhrich, and Deniz Undav, were brought on to enhance the local flavor for the fans.
